name: Tunnel Portal
description: An entrance to an underground passage provides access through mountains or other obstacles. The controlled access allows for toll collection and security, while the enclosed nature creates opportunities for ambush or defense.
atmosphere: Echoing footsteps bounce off stone walls while distant water drips from the mountain's embrace. The air carries the scent of stone, earth, and the promise of underground passage. Every sound echoes with amplified importance. Your skin feels the cool stone and the weight of enclosed danger. The taste of controlled access and mountain mystery fills your mouth.
